titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lucille White, Gerald J. White, Gary White, and Sara White.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to four named individuals in full satisfaction of a family's claims against the United States arising from a construction accident.
